lang.alreadyInCart: "{{name}}" is already in cart. Click the cart icon to view your current items.
lang.itemAddedToCart: Item added to cart. Click the cart icon to view your current items.
lang.itemRemovedFromCart: Item removed from cart. Click the cart icon to view your current items.
lang.labelChangeQuantity: Use the arrow buttons to change the quantity you'd like to buy
lang.contactingPaymentProvider: Contacting {{paymentProvider}}. Please, wait and do not reload the page.
lang.cookiesAreDisabled: The cookies in your browser are disabled and items added to cart will not be persisted across pages.
